properties.Name: ProductStatus
properties.Description: The status of the product for the associated period.

Columns.Name: ProductId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product.

Columns.Name: ProductStatusTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Product Status Type.

Columns.Name: CountryId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of the Country.

Columns.Name: PeriodStartDate
Columns.Description: The period start date for which the associated product status is effective.

Columns.Name: PeriodEndDate
Columns.Description: The period end date for which the associated product status is effective.

Columns.Name: ProductStatusNote
Columns.Description: A note, comment or additional information regarding the product status.
